dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Oh...

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Dammit...

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: It had to be you, huh. I really hoped we'd never have to meet...
Xichun...! Ya doing okay?!

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Well, I'm... not dead.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: But I'm almost out of coins, as you can see.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: We were attacked by Jia Huan, who wiped out our clan's remaining forces.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: I barely managed to protect what I had because there was no way I was letting him eliminate me, but... Well, given how the game's going, I guess I'll place somewhere within the top 5 merely by surviving this far in the shrinking arena.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Good enough to pick up some trinket from a random corner in the treasury. Isn't that right, brother?
Xichun almost let out a wry laugh, caught herself, then sighed deeply as she regarded us.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: So what's happening here? You guys look rough. And... what's big sis Daiyu doing here...?
Jia Xichun asked, realizing the oddly downcast atmosphere surrounding our group.
Oh. You don't need to mind that, Xichun.
But if you want to come with, you could—

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: No.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Just leave me. If I'm to be eliminated, I'll at least face it head-on and accept it.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: My lady...

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Wei, the Family Hierarch war was a place to demonstrate what I have prepared so far.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: This just means that I haven't prepared well enough.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: It sucks, and it's frustrating, but... I have to accept the results.
... I see. The game should end soon, since they said there aren't that many candidates left in the game.
I'll see you outside. Stay safe.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: ... Really? You're... just gonna let me go? Aren't you gonna take my coins?

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: You don't have nearly enough coins to—
I'm in the same place as you are. It sucks, but we're going to try our best to the end.
But I don't want to take what is yours.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: I don't know when it happened, but... I knew that you'd suddenly... changed.

dataList.place: A Certain Day in Daguanyuan, Past
dataList.content: What... did you say?
Yes, Xichun. If that is what you want...
... feel free to hurt me, kill me just like our own siblings and children from other families have.
I'm bound to leave Daguanyuan in a few years' time, so...
... before that happens, maybe you can—
How... could you say something like that to me?
I... Well, you know.
I don't want to care about matters of life and death anymore.
You... never should have said that. To me.
... I won't be visiting you ever, ever again.
And I hope our paths never cross even after you depart Daguanyuan.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Those words haunted me every time I saw your face, brother.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: You were smiling... like someone who'd already given up on everything.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: But I guess I have no room to talk. I didn't even bother asking you what happened, I just...

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: ... completely ignored and avoided you.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: I ran into big brother Qiu earlier.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: I thought he was going to kill me, or take away what few coins I had, but...

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: ... he just glanced at me before walking away.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Weird, right?

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: You... big brother Qiu... I have no idea what either of you want.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: ... You should keep moving.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: Rest assured, I will protect my lady to my last dying breath.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: I wish you good tidings until the end of the games.
